Name: PaulPaul - Act 1
About the game: THE GAME Paul is a VR narrative experience where players try to figure out their identity through exploring surroundings and events in a futuristic and often changing environment. MISSION STATEMENT Utilizing the immersive possibilities of VR to explore and create narrative experiences, all through the lens of the Tech-Noir genre. GENRE Tech-Noir, Sci-Fi, Narrative, Adventure, IndieSTORYLINE The story takes place in the not-so-distant future, when Earth is on the brink of colonizing Mars. Breakthroughs in terraforming, AI and other technologies have at last made such a notion possible. CHARACTERS Paul, our main character, is a scientist specialized in Atmospheric chemistry & dynamics. He is given the opportunity to take part in a dangerous but groundbreaking mission to Mars that will drive him to abandon his life and family on Earth in the pursuit of his dream.
